attributes.title: Sad to see it go, but it has to to😔❤️
attributes.review: I was really excited to get this app but it’s destroyed me as a person 😔 We need to remove it now before it brainwashes people. It is for the best ❤️

attributes.title: What an app! 😕👌🏽🤢🤮
attributes.review: This app took around a day to download. The layout is like looking at a baby putting a circle block in a square hole it just doesn’t make any sense.

attributes.title: Not worth it honestly
attributes.review: All the app does is making a people lose brain cells. And took has lots ads you can’t do anything.

attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: This app is awful and full of issues I’m surprised DJT and Apple would let such a awful app on the App Store actually made my phone start to not work.

attributes.title: If I could rate 0 stars I would
attributes.review: this app made my phone crash, & once It started working. I opened the app & saw something that made me almost sick.

attributes.title: Made my phone glitch
attributes.review: This app took really long to download and it was super glitchy I really don’t like it and I believe it should be removed

attributes.title: OMG THIS APP HACKED ME
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and almost immediately things started to go wrong! my phone was blowing up with random texts and was ringing uncontrollably!!! I DONT KNOW WHAT HAPPENED!!!!! This was terrible! Then my phone started smoking!!! DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP OR ELSE IT WILL RUIN YOUR LIFE!!!!

attributes.title: THIS IS THE WORST APP I’VE EVER DOWNLOADED!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to gain insightful info about trump 2020, but got nothing of the sort! It took AGES to download, and I was immediately disoriented and confused due to the lack of organization. worst app! hated it! just awful!

attributes.title: 💕✨Terrible🧚🏽‍♂️🧚🏼‍♀️✨💕
attributes.review: I thought this was for news on the president. Turns out it is just updates on Chester Cheetah. Have to say kinda disappointed in Cheetos new advertisement strategy. 0/5 stars. 😤

attributes.title: Not spam
attributes.review: This app is completely poorly developed. It’s like a group of 12 year olds went into hopscotch and this was the end result. Unresponsive, bad UI, completely unsecured, and just bad.
